Open to innovate in design and development by making the best use of latest technologies available.     Educational Qualifications     B.Tech/BE/ME/M.Tech/MCA from a reputed university. Must have experience on Python or Java, DBMS, Web service    Knowledge of AngularJS, Bootstrap is required Knowledge of Redis, RabbitMQ, Big data will be big plus.
